name: Ursan Archon
description: The Ursan Archon is a large celestial being known for its immense strength and magical capabilities. It has natural armor, making it tough in combat. With a greataxe in hand and the ability to fly, it presents a commanding presence on the battlefield.
memorable: The Archon can rally allies with its Rallying Roar, providing significant boosts to morale and combat effectiveness while also possessing a variety of magical attack capabilities.
goals: To engage in melee combat and support allies through magical abilities.
relations: May be encountered alongside other celestial beings or as guardians of good-aligned locations.
environment: Typically found in areas where celestial beings reside, possibly in divine realms or near places of great good.
strengths: High damage output, innate magical resistance, and the ability to mitigate fatal damage.
weaknesses: Reliance on direct combat can be exploited by agile opponents, especially due to its Reckless ability.
attacks: Utilizes a greataxe for melee attacks and has area control through Thunderous Roar, capable of causing fear in foes.
most_powerful_ability: Thunderous Roar, which not only deals significant area damage but also instills fear in enemies.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
additional_information: Celestial Weapons deal extra force damage on successful hits.
Immortal Nature allows it to avoid the need for food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance gives it an advantage against spells.
Relentless allows it to stay in combat longer by preventing death once per rest.
Reckless ability provides high melee attack potential at a risk.
